tokenCountTooltipTotalTokens: Current message will send {{inputCount}} tokens in addition to the {{contextCount}} tokens of previous messages in current chat.
tokenCountTooltipAboutConsumtion: This amount of tokens, in conjuction with the selected LLM model and chatbot response, determine the amount of budget consumed in the message.
tokenCountTooltipHowToReduceConsumption: To reduce consumption you can either select a cheaper model, reduce the size of the message sent or create new chats to avoid sending previous messages that are not needed.
